reviews.text: Lovely hotel with lovely staff, especially the servers at breakfast who were so helpful! Breakfast was really nice! About 15-20 minute walk from the cathedral! Would definitely stay here again!

Perfect. And yes with the risk of sounding like an employee. Room was with 2 separate beds and a sleeping bench. Perfect for with kids. Shower or even whole bedroom looks recently new.
Breakfast is super! 12.50, but unlimited everything, no need for lunch.

20 minutes walk from the cathedral, but via a nice shopping area or along the river rine. So good routes. Would do again for sure!

I'm a South African I had a great stay at the hotel amazing stuff, Bianca and Nina where very friendly we felt like home they welcomed us well until our last day,chef bijon amazing he goes an extra mile, we had a meeting in Berlin and we had to catch a fast train around 7 .00 am, he prepared us breakfast packs for our long trip,amazing caring loving stuff

The best part of the hotel is its location. Its very close to Hbf and there's a station just a few minutes away by walk. The rooms are pretty spacious and seem to be recently painted. The air conditioner was also working fine and the Wifi connectivity was decent. Room was clean. The floor carpet and sofa and chairs were old and worn out, but hopefully the hotel will replace them soon. We didn't have breakfast.

A great hotel for a stay in Cologne as it is in the center of the city, have to say that the service was great due to Nina (—Å–ø–∞—Å–∏–±–æ –∑–∞ —Ç–∞–∫–æ–µ –≥–æ—Å—Ç–µ–ø—Ä–∏–∏–º—Å—Ç–≤–æ üôè).
From negatives I have to note a really bad wifi and rudeness of a night shift staff member (forgot his name, he is bald and overweight).
